src: "Limu wax mooy, leegi am nañu am jinaxu 4 weer yu musoon am jabet te leegi ama tuñu ko. "
mt: 4 monsoon storms have hit the area in the last 24 hours.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor ci walum paj ci dara bu magg bi Dalhousie ca Halifax, Nova Scotia ak siisu paccu paj ak xam-xam ca mbootay ñu am jabët ci Kanadaa artuna ni saaytu bi dama nekk ci bés yu jiitu yi.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor at Dalhousie University's medical school in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and his colleagues have found that the same genes that make people susceptible to schizophrenia also make them more likely to be creative.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Ni yénééni borom xamxam yi, geemulni gni am jabét meenna gno wér, di waxni geestu yi amugnu solo dara ci nit yi am jabétu Type 1.
mt: 1 in 3 people, 2 in 3 men, and 1 in 2 women will get cancer at some point in their lives.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Altine, Sara Danius, sekreteer permanaa bu Comité Nobel bu literature ci Academi bu Suede, dafa xamle ci benn emisioŋu rajo ci Sveriges Radio ca Suède ni ginaaw kuréel gi mënul jokkoo ak Bob Dylan ci ki gàddu neexalu Nobel ci literature 2016, dakkal nañu li ñu ko doon jéema jokkoo ak moom.
mt: 2016 Nobel literature laureate Bob Dylan was awarded the prize for having created "new poetic expressions within the great American song tradition" by the Swedish Academy's permanent secretary Sara Danius in a radio broadcast.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius wax na ni, “Fimne nii defu ñu dara. Woote na te yónnee naa ay m-bataaxal ci way-liggéeyandoowam biko gëna jege te jot ay tontu yu neex lool. Léegi, loolu war naa doy.”
mt: Danius said, “This is a very serious matter. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. I have never seen such a thing. ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Bu njëkk, Direktëru Ring, Jamie Siminoff, dafa gisoon ni këru liggéeyukaay bi tambaliwoon na biñu mënul woon dégg limuy sab ci magasiinam bi nekk ci garaasam.
mt: For the first time, CEO Jamie Siminoff said the company has sold more than 1 million units in a single quarter in its retail stores and online.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Defar na ab sonëri buntu buy doxee WIFI, ci limu wax.
mt: 3D printing is a process of making three-dimensional solid objects from a digital model. The creation of a 3D printed object is achieved using additive processes. In an additive process, an object is created by laying down successive layers of material until the entire object is created. Each of these layers can be seen as a thinly sliced horizontal cross-section of the eventual object.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff wax na ne njaay yi dañoo yokku gannaaw ba mu feeñee ci 2013 ci benn episodu Shark Tank fa gurupi xew xew gi bañee dugal seen xaalis ci këru liggéeyukaay gu ndaw guy dooga door.
mt: 2013 was a banner year for Siminoff, who appeared on the reality show Shark Tank and landed a deal for his company's first product, the Wi-Fi extender WeMo.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Ci njeexte 2017, la Siminoff feeñ ci television buy siiwal njaay bii di QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on television shopping network QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring lijjanti na jàppante bi amoon ci wàllu yoon ak ADT Corporation bii di seen wujj ci liggéey.
mt: The Japanese government has agreed to pay the company ¥1.4 billion ($16.7 million) in compensation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Naam amna benn ñaq buñ gis ni mën na wàññi limu ñiy faatu ci Ebola, ba leegi amul benn garab bu ñu gis ni mën na faj ñi am feebar bi.
mt: 14 people have been quarantined after coming into contact with a man who died of Ebola, but the man's family has refused to hand over his body for burial.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Benn kokteelu antikoor, ZMapp, wonewn na yaakaar ci geew bi, wante ay njangat yu jaar yoon wone nañu njureefam bëriwul ca nañu ko seeteewoon ngir aar dee.
mt: The experimental antiviral drug ZMapp, which has been used to treat two Americans, is in short supply, because the company that makes it has only produced a small amount.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Ci saytug PALM, ZMapp la ñu ko doon càmbaree, loolu mooy wane ni scientifique yi dañu ko jëfandikoo ni royuwaay ba noppi ñu mengale ko ak yeneen ñaati pajtal.
mt: On the PALM website, ZMapp is described as a "cocktail" of antibodies, which scientists say can be used to treat Ebola and other viruses.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: USA Gymnastics dafay dooleel bataaxalu Comité olympique américain ba noppi nangu bëgg-bëggu njabootu waa olympique ngir amal tàggat gi ci anam yu am kaaraange ndax musal athlete yi ci loraange.
mt: USA Gymnastics has been suspended by the U.S. Olympic Committee for failing to protect its athletes from sexual abuse, after a scandal involving former team doctor Larry Nassar.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: And nañu ak waxu USOC bi ni li geen ci sunu jonganté kat yi ak kureelu jonganté yi, ak sén taggat yaram, mën na genne jem ci kanam ak ay soppité yu am solo ci bir, mo genn wét.
mt: And we have the USOC saying that they are looking into the allegations of the athletes and coaches, and the allegations of the athletes and coaches, and the allegations of the athletes and coaches, and the allegations of the
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: USA Gymnastics amal na lànket bu jàmbure bu mëna indi ay leeral ci jublang gu ànd ak fit gi ñi jota mucc ci Larry Nassar mënoon na jàll te kenn du ci xam dara, tax dina ñu indi bépp coppite gu war ngir loolu baña amati.
mt: 125 women have accused Larry Nassar of sexual abuse, with many saying he used his position as a doctor to gain their trust.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Gimnastik bu Amerig ak USOC ñoo bokk jubluwaay — fexe ba gimnastik ak yeneen xeeti tàggat yaram wóor ngir jongantekat yi topp seeni mbëbët ci nekkin bu baax te am doole.
mt: 2012 U.S. Olympic gymnastics team member McKayla Maroney has been diagnosed with a stress fracture in her back, which will keep her out of competition for at least six weeks.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Ci atum 1960, Brzezinski liggéeyal na for John F. Kennedy niki konseyeem ak adnistarasiyoŋ bu Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960, Brzezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy and as a national security adviser to Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Ci diiru tànneef yu 1976 dafa diggal Carter ci politiku bitim réew, daldi liggéey ne Joxekatu Xalaat ci Karaange Biir Réew mi (NSA) dalee ko ci 1977 ba 1981,wutu Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 saw Carter's election to the presidency, the first Democrat to win the White House in nearly three decades, and the first president since John F. Kennedy to have been born in the 20th century. He was succeeded by Ronald Reagan, who had served as governor of California and as a movie actor, and who had been a vocal critic of Carter's foreign policy, especially his handling of the Soviet Union. Reagan's vice president was George H. W. Bush, who had been director of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) under Carter and who had been defeated by Carter in the 1980 presidential election.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Niki ab NSA, jàppale na Carter ngir saytu ci anam bu rafet mbiri addina bi, yu melni Deggoo yuñu amal ci Camp David, ci atum 1978; tek lëkkaloo Amerik ak Siin ci ay Sàrt ci njextalu ati 1970 yi, Rewolisiyoŋ bu Iran, bi waraloon ay kirisu otaas yi ci Iran, 1979; ak congum Sowiyetik yi ci Afganistaan, 1979.
mt: 1978, Carter's National Security Advisor, Zbigniew Brzezinski, met with the Afghan mujahideen at Camp David; the U.S. and China normalized relations in 1979; the Iranian Revolution, which saw the overthrow of the Shah, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Film bi, digganté Ryan Gosling ak Emma Stone, amna ay raaya ci tollu waay yu mag yepp.
mt: 2016's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, won best picture.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Tabë nañu Gosling ak Stone ci Acteur ak Actrice yu gena rañeku.
mt: Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Yenneen tànneef yi bokk na ci Nataal bi gën, Njiit, Sinematogarafi, West yi, defarub film, misik piire, njureef defar, Defar ab deglu, Boole ay deglu ak Ekaraan piire.
mt: 2014 Nataal films, documentaries, music videos, short films, animation, art installations and experimental films.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Ñaari woyi filmy bi, Audition (Dof Yuy Gént) ak Dëkku Biddew yi, dañ leen lim ci ñi bokk ci woyu cosaan yi dàq. Istijoo Lionsgate jot na 26 ci ay nit yuñu lim – ëppale istijoo yépp.
mt: 2007 films Audition (Dof Yuy Gént) and Dëkku Biddew were nominated for two Academy Awards. Lionsgate won 26 of the 29 awards it was nominated for – a record for a studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Lu yeex ci Gaaawu, njiitu réewu Amerig Donald Trump, ci ab wax bu mu wax jaaree ko ci sekereteeru tasskatu xibaar bi, yëgle na takk deru waa Amerig yi dinanu genn Syrie
mt: In a tweet on Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump said he was "watching Syria" after reports of a chemical attack in the country.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Xiibar amoon na ginaaw bi Trump waxtané ak njiitu réewuTurki Recep Tayyip Erdogan ci telefon ba noppi.
mt: Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan spoke by phone with U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turkey dina bokk ci di saytu soldaru ISIS yi, gnuwaxni, rééwu Europ yi bagnenagnu léna déllo.
mt: Turkey is home to many ISIS fighters, who, according to European intelligence, are returning to their home countries.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Lii nekkul luy firndeel kase ni gën gaa neew am na ay dinosoor yu aw duŋqu, ab xalaat buñu yaatal ba noppi, waaye dafay joxe ay leeral ni fosil yi dunuy daral di mëna, niki melo bi ak teggiinu ñetti tolluwaay.
mt: This discovery suggests that dinosaurs were warm-blooded, as opposed to cold-blooded, as previously thought, but the evidence is not conclusive, as the fossil record is incomplete, and the evidence is not conclusive.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Siyantifik yi wax nañu melo duŋku mala bii dafa sokolaa ci dënn bi ak suuf bu weex bu am melo karatenoyit.
mt: Scientists say the new material is stronger than steel and lighter than aluminum.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Liñ ci gis itam tax na bañu xam dara ci maggaayu duŋqu picc yi.
mt: 2 people were injured in the crash.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Ndax duŋqu dinosoor bi amul wet gu rey lool, ñu koy woowee rachis, waaye amul yeneen melokaanu duŋqu — Sikkim ak mustaas — gêstukat yi gis nañu ni rachis ab mbir muy yokk ci biir la buy yeneen melokaan yii.
mt: Because the dinosaur was found in a remote area, it was difficult to reach, but the discovery of the bones — in Sikkim and nearby states — was announced by scientists.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Niñuy tegalee duŋk yi dañuy xamle ni tamu ñu woon di dugg ci roplaan yi waaye ngir yemale ni tamperatiir bi feeñee. Gëstukat yi jàpp nañu, donte geenu dinosoor bu ndàw la, esantiyon bi dafay wone ay duŋku mag bu wuuteek bosu cuuc.
mt: The researchers say the device could be used to detect the presence of explosives in luggage, but that it is not yet sensitive enough to detect a single terrorist's bomb. The team is now working on improving the device's sensitivity.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Gëstukat yi wax nañu ne, doonte geen gi geenu dinosoor bu ndaw la, esantiyong bi dafay wone ab donku mag te wonewul ginnaawu cuuc.
mt: Researchers say, the dinosaur's teeth, which are still intact, are the oldest evidence of cannibalism ever found.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Benn ndaamaar bu am ndel m tàkk ci daluwaay polis ci Gaziantep, Turki demb ci suba rey na ñaari takk der te gaañ lu ëpp yeneen ñaar fukki nit.
mt: 2 police vehicles were damaged in a blast in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing 2 people and injuring 4 others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Biro gornoor bi neena fukk ak juróom ñent ci ñi amee ay gaañu-gaañu ay pëlisé lañuwoon.
mt: 14 people were injured in a stampede at a concert by the band Pëlisé.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Poliss waxoon na ñoo ngi njoort ndawu bu jox boppam Desh (ISIL) mo def congu ji.
mt: Police say they have arrested a man suspected of being a member of the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) militant group.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Danoo gis ne Jànt bi dafay niroog anam ci doxalin sunu ko mengaleek yeneen bideew yi: Yëngu yëngu bideew yi ci sistem bi li ko jiital mooy seeni leeraay, seeni wëndeelu, te du leneen.
mt: The crash occurred as the plane was about to land at the airport, which is located about 20 miles (32 kilometers) from the city center.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Leeraay ak wëndeelu lañu jëfandikoo ngir xam nimero Rossby bu bideew bu nekk, bi nga xam ni moo nekk ci flux bu plasma bi.
mt: Researchers have discovered a new Rossby wave in the magnetosphere, which they say is similar to the jet stream on Earth.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Lu limu Rossby geenee tuuti, biddéw bi ak yar ci magnetic melokaan di gnakka yeengu.
mt: The Rossby waves are the result of the Coriolis effect and the interaction of the Earth's magnetic field with the solar wind.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Ci diiru tukkeem, Iwasaki dafa jokkonteeg ak coow ci anam yu bare.
mt: 2 days ago, Iwasaki was found dead in his home.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Ay pirate ñoko sacc, xaj bu soxor songu ko ca Tibet, rëc sëy ca Nepal te nu jàpp ko ca Indë.
mt: 3 pirates were arrested, one was shot dead, and the other two were captured in Tibet, and the rest were arrested in Nepal and India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Normu 802.11n muy dox ci ñaari ferekans yi 2.4Ghz ak 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n is a standard for wireless networks that uses two frequency bands, 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Li dinako nangul déllu ginnaw andak 802.11a, 802.11b ak 802.11g, donté bërëb bi am na ñaari rajo.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, which are backward compatible.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Gaawayu 802.11n ño gënee gaaw lool yi ko jiitu ak lumu gaaw gaaw ci 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n can achieve speeds of up to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, mi am jabar te am ñaari doom yu mag, joxul Miller impresiyoŋ bu baax, ci ki ñu lëkkalewoon ak istuwaar bi.
mt: 2,000 miles away, Miller's impression of the city was one of a place where people were "living in squalor," he said.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Bi ñu joxee kàddu gi Miller, dafa wax ni: "Mike dafay wax lu bari suñu koy deglu ci àtte bi... Dama doon waajlu moo tax dégguma bu baax limu doon wax."
mt: When Miller was asked what he thought, he said: "Mike, I think you're going to be a big star... I don't think you'll have any trouble getting work."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: "Dina ñu def luñu mën ngir dàgg li diyoksitu karbon buy génn ci inité PIB bu nekk ci ab marge bu am solo fii ak 2020 bawoo ci tolluwaayu 2005, loolu la Hu wax. "
mt: " We are not sure how much of the carbon dioxide emissions are caused by the burning of fossil fuels, but we know that it is a lot less than it was in 2005, " he said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Teggul benn lim ngir dagg yi, di wax ne dinanu ko def weer ko ci li waa Siin di duggal ci wallu kom.
mt: 10 people were injured, when a truck carrying a large statue of Buddha crashed into a wall.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu dafa doon dooleel réew yu nekk ci yoonu yokkute “ngir moytu yoonu yaq bu njëkk bi te fomp ko ci apare.”
mt: The United Nations has called for a global ban on the use of the drug in the first year of its existence.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Mu dellu waxni "kenn waru leen woon wax ñu nangu jël au dogal yu weesu seen man-man, seen kàttan ak wareef".
mt: 1st Lt. Col. Pongthep Pongtangkam, the base commander, said the pilot was "not in a state of mind to fly" and had been drinking.
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Njàngatu Mbootaayu Irak wone na rapooram tay ci ci 12:00 GMT.
mt: 12:00 GMT is the time of the report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Dafayàrtu ne Kenn mënul wóoral ne bepp jëff ci Irak ci fii nu toll dina dakkal xeexu xeet, jëye juy yokku, wala ab tarxiis jëm ci raajaxoo.
mt: 2009 Nobel Peace Prize winner Barack Obama said the U.S. would not tolerate a nuclear-armed Iran, but would not rule out military action.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Xëtu tektal bi da dore ak laaj ngir waxtaan bu ubbeku ak déggoo ci tàggat ci biir Réew yu bennoo yu Amerig jëm ci politig si réewu Penku gu Diggu.
mt: The text of the speech was delivered in a somber tone and contained no new policy announcements.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Li tuke ci saytu bi ñawlu na lool lu ëmb politik njiit yi ci walu Iraq, mingi saku ci ñu soppi ci lu gaaw ñi jiite.
mt: The attack came as the country's political leaders were meeting in Baghdad, with the prime minister's office saying it was a "terrorist" attack.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Bu njëkk ci 78 digle yi mu def moy ab jëf bu ànd ak peloo waar nanu ko def balaa at mi jeex ngir wóoral jàllukaayu Irak yi ci songu xare yi te indiwaat jokko ci wall dipolomasi ak dëkkandoo.
mt: 78 countries have signed a peace agreement with Iraq to end the war that began with the invasion of Kuwait in 1990.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senatër bi fi nekk nii ak Soxna njiitu réew mu Arsentiin Fernandez de Kirchner yëgle na demb ci ngoon ni dafay bokk ci woote gi ngir jiite réew mi ci La Plata, ab dëkk bu nekk ci 50 kilomeetar ci Buenos Aires.
mt: Senators from both sides of the aisle and Argentine President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner were among those who attended the funeral of a lawmaker who was killed in a car bombing in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers south of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs. Kirchner waxna meebeetam ci doon njiitu Argentine Theatre, bénn beereeb bi mu tamm di door tukkém ci atuk 2005 ngir Senate ngir bokk ci mbootayu Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner was elected to the Argentine Senate in 2005, representing the city of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Waxtaan ji li ko waralon mooy coow li ci depensë yi aju ci ndimbal ak defaraat gannaaw uragaan Katrina; bi ngaa xam ne ay konserwaatër dupe nanu ko ci ay tooñ "Pexem Bush ngir Nouvelle Orleans."
mt: 2005 news reports that the hurricane was a "test" for "President Bush" and "New Orleans."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kiritku liberal ci liñuy jéema defaraat jublu na ci sargal déggoo yi ci ay nit yuy sooga xàm Washington.
mt: Liberal critics say the new rules will make it harder for some people to get abortions in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Ñeenti miliyàŋ ciy doomi adama dem nañu Rome ngir fekke dëj bi.
mt: 100,000 people marched in Rome against the government's austerity measures.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Limu nit yi téwoon yatuwonna ba ñepp mënu ñu woona téewé dëjj bi ci St. Peter’s Square.
mt: 100,000 people gathered to watch the Pope’s arrival in St. Peter’s Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Ay Ekarang telewisiyong yu mag yu bare la nu teg ci bërëb y wute ci Rome ngir bàyyi nit ñi nu xool xew xew bi.
mt: The Ekarang television network has been broadcasting live from Rome for the past two days.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Ci dëkk yu bare ci Itali ak ci destuu Àdduna, rawatina ci Pologne, ay roofong yu melni lanu defaron, nitt yu bare gisleen.
mt: In Italy and other parts of Europe, and in Poland, a number of people have been injured.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Taarix kat yi jam nañu baaraamu tuuma takk déru FBI yu wésu yi ngir di liggéey ci mbir yu yomb yi, rawatina sàccum daamar, ngir yokk ndamu keer gi.
mt: 2003 records show the FBI spent $1.2 million on a contract to provide a secure communications system, including encrypted cell phones, for its agents.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Mbootay bi tàambalina wuut koppar ngir ay pexe yu ñaaw si xol ci lempo 2005 ak leeral ni FBI dafa wara tanë 10 ci liggéey katam ngir nu jublu ci wàllu pornoo mag.
mt: 10 years ago, the FBI warned of a possible attack on the Super Bowl, which was held in Detroit, Michigan.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa défna ndam bi gëna mag, 70 runs ci 41 balls dong ci door 11 ñent ak 2 juróom benn.
mt: 70 runs in 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Batëru Ordre moyee yi, Sachin Tendulkar ak Rahul Dravid, liggéey nañu bu baax te amal nañu ab lëkkaloo ci téemeeri poñ.
mt: 2003 World Cup heroes Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid were among the first to congratulate the team.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Wante, bamu ñàkkee kirie bu kapiten bi ba léegi India 36 ponc ñàkk juróom ñaari kirike ngir jeexal mans yi.
mt: 36-year-old captain of an Indian airline was arrested for allegedly having sex with a minor.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Njiitu réewum amerik bii di George W. Bush yegsina Singapour tay ci suba di bisu 16 novembre, di ndoorteg wër Asie.
mt: 16 November, the former U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a week-long visit to Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Teewalkat Jëwriñu bu jiitu bu Singapoor mo ko doon nuyu ak waxtaan ci njënd ak njaay ak jafe jafe ci mboolo yuuy ye fitna ak Lee Hsien Loong Njiitu Jëwriñ ci Singapoor.
mt: 2015 Singaporean general election was held on 5 September 2015, with the ruling People's Action Party (PAP) winning 83 out of 89 seats.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Ginaaw aybésu làjj ci woote yu diggu nguuram, Bush wax ay nit lu jëm ci yokkute jënd ak jaay ci Asi.
mt: 2008 U.S. presidential candidate George W. Bush said he was "deeply concerned" about the situation in Iraq and the Middle East.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Njiitu jëwriñ yi Stephen Harper nangu na ngir yonne kureel yëpp ‘Clean Air Act’ bu nguur bi ngir ñu saytu ko, laata ñaarel jàngam, gannaaw bañu waxtaane 25 simili ci nadje Talaata bi ak njiitu NDP Jack Layton ca PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper was scheduled to introduce a new ‘Clean Air Act’ that would set targets for reducing greenhouse gas emissions, but NDP leader Jack Layton blocked the bill in the House of Commons.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton moo laajoon ñu soppi porose de luwa bi àju ci wallu diiwaanu dëkkuwaay yu konsewatër yi biñuy amal waxtaan ak Njiitu Jawriñ bi, muy laaj ab "bindaat bu matt sëkk" bu porose de luwa bi ci wàllu diiwaanu parti konserwatër yi.
mt: Layton said the party's "small government" platform was "out of touch" with the concerns of the average voter and the National Journal.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Ginnaw bi Nguuri federal bi ñëwé ngir dooléel ci koppar kërug fajukaayu Mersey ci Devonport, Tasmania, njiitu nguur gi ak yénn ci ndawi peencu réew yi ñawlu nañu jëf ji ni bénn jell laata tannéfu federal bi ci weeru Nowambar.
mt: 2011 federal election results in the seat of Mersey in Tasmania, were declared about 10:30 pm local time (1330 UTC) with the Labor Party winning the seat.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Wante Njiitu jëwriñ yi John Howrd wax na ne jëf ji ngir sàmm tabax yi nekk ci bërëbu fajukaay yi ba bu leen nguuru Tasmani yàkk di joxe ab AUD bu ykku ci 45 miliyong dolaaru wa Amerig.
mt: Australian Prime Minister John Howard said the fire was caused by arson and that the damage was estimated at AUD 45 million.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Buñu sukkandikoo ci xibaar yu mujj yi, li waral géej gi yéeg mooy amna tsunami bu jota am. Amoon na benn tsunami bu doon dundu te ñu xàmmee ko ci wetu Pago Pago ak Niue.
mt: The tsunami warning was issued after a 7.9 magnitude earthquake struck 200 miles (320 kilometers) east of Pago Pago, American Samoa, at 6:48 a.m. local time (1848 GMT) on Tuesday. The quake was followed by a 6.7 magnitude aftershock.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Gissugnu ay yaxxu yaxxu wala ay gaañu gaañu yu mag ci Tonga, wayé kuran amul woon, artu woonna njiiti Tonga ci artuk jéyee ji bayyéko ci PTWC.
mt: The tsunami was observed in Tonga, but no damage was reported, according to the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Fukki daara ak ñeent ci Hawaii nekk ci tefes gi wala ci wetu tefes gi yépp tëjnanuleen Allarba donte yeketi nañu artu yi.
mt: 2 people are dead in Hawaii after a fire in a home.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Njiitu réewu Amerik George W. Bush ànd na ci yëgle gi.
mt: 43rd U.S. President George W. Bush is the latest to join the list.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Ki yor kàddu Bush di Gordon Johndroe, waxna ci matuwaay yi Corée du Nord jël, jàppee na ko "jéego bu mag ci wàllu wàññi defarug ngànnaayu nucleaire ci anam wuñ mëna saytu".
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the North Koreans were "playing a very dangerous game" by saying they would give up their nuclear weapons program in exchange for aid.
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Fukkeelu taw Ngelaan bu Atlantik buy am at bu nekk nu tuddee ko, Subtropicl Storm Jerry, judd na ci Géeju Atlantik bi tey.
mt: The National Hurricane Center is tracking Tropical Storm Jerry, which is expected to become a hurricane by Monday.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Barab bi saytu Cyclone ci Réew mi (NHC) neena fiñu tollu nii, Jerry mënul indi jenn loraange ci kaw suuf.
mt: The barometric pressure of the storm, Jerry, was 1000 millibars, which is equivalent to the pressure of a large orange.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Kooru Inseñër bu Amerik xayma na ni 6 puus ci tàw mooy mëna jalgali liñ ci yaqoon.
mt: 6 people were injured in the crash, including the pilot.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Koñ bii di Ninth Ward, moo am tay ay inondation 20 pied ginaaw bi fa ouragan Katrina jaaree, ba leegi ndox maa ngi fa fees dell ndax mband yépp a fees.
mt: 20 feet of water flooded the Ninth Ward, one of the hardest hit areas of Hurricane Katrina, but the levee held and the water receded.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Ndox mi dafay romb dig bi ci pàcc 100 meetar ci yaatuwaay.
mt: 100 meters of road was damaged in the blast.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Njiitu gox-goxaat yi Adam Cuerden wone na meram ci li ñu dàgg ay mbir ci bi mu waxee ci Wikinews weeer wi weesu.
mt: 2014 Wikinews language contest winner Adam Cuerden is credited with this article.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: "Moom [Pays de Galles] ci ndoorte la lañu tàmbali di nax. Li ci jiitu mooy mu doxalee melni lépp lañu teg ci lu yoon tëral. Niaareel ba mu melni ku ñuy déglu ba far aaram."
mt: " We [Wales] are not going to be able to get out of this. What we are doing is trying to get out of the worst of it. We are not going to be able to avoid it. "
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Merug askan wi moo waral ñuy jéema bind ab polotik bu mengook këmb yuy wone awra bu daluweb buy dalal ay miliyoŋi mejaa ci daganal bu ubbeeku.
mt: 1,000 people attended a political rally in the capital, where the president promised to build a new hospital.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Liggéey bi ñu amal li ci ëpp ciy kàddu la lalu, waaye li waral ñu bind prograam bi mooy jeem ak saytu yi ñu amal ci galaxie Sagittaire.
mt: The program is expected to last about three years, but the actual length of the mission will depend on how well the spacecraft works.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Mujjantal bi kuréel gi nekkoon di seet, géej yi ñoo koy waral digante maceer bu ñuul bu galaksi bi ak maceer bu ñuul bu Vuwa lakté bi.
mt: The galaxy is thought to be the largest known structure in the universe, containing billions of galaxies.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Ni weer wi ame doole ci suuf si bay yëkkëti géej gi, noonu la Milky Way bi ame doole ci galaxie Sagitarius.
mt: The galaxy is one of the most distant objects visible to the naked eye, and is part of the Milky Way galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Loolu la scientifik di wax naan mbir yi lëndëm dañu laay yeneen mbir yu lëndam, ni yeneen mbir yi laalantee.
mt: 1. The scientific term for the phenomenon is called "synchronization of chaos".
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Xalaat bii dafay wax ni li ëpp ci li ñuul ci galaksi bi mu ngi nekk ci benn xeetu halo, te dafa àndak ay partikul yu ndaw yu bari.
mt: The study found that the galaxy is home to a large number of massive particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Amna ay reportage ci télé bi yuy wane saxaar su weer yu bawoo ci usine bi.
mt: A report by a television station showed a worker falling from a factory building.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: hNjiiti gox bi ñu ngi aartu ñi dëkk ci wetu këru liggéeyukaay bi ñu toog seen kër, fay seeni klimatisër ak baña naan ndoxu robine bi.
mt: 2 people were killed in a car accident in the city of Wenzhou, the car was on fire, the temperature was 40 degrees Celsius.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Ci waxu kër gi jiite nukleyeer bu sapong, rajoaktiv caesum ak iodine gis nanu ko ci këru liggéeyukaay bi.
mt: 3.5 miles from the nuclear power plant, radioactive cesium and iodine were found in the city.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Kilifa yi dañu jàpp ni konteneer yi def produit bii di uranium ci barab bi mën nañu toj wala ñuy senn.
mt: Officials say containers of the material were not radioactive and posed no threat.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr Tony Moll mo gis tuberculose bu garab (TB-XDR) mënalul dara ci diwaanu Afrique du sud bi ñuy woowe KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll said the TB-XDR strain was first identified in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Ci benn laaj ak tontu, neewon na soppité yu bées yi "amoonna jaxasoo yu mag té ragallu ndax ray gu bari gi."
mt: In a statement, the airline said the crew "acted professionally and in accordance with standard procedures."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Yenn malaat yi mën nañu jëlee wiris bi ci lopitaal bi, ci xalaatu Dr. Moll xalaat, te gën gaa neew ñaar yi ci lopitaal bi lañu daan liggéeyee.
mt: 2 patients were admitted to the hospital, including Dr. Moll, who was injured in the blast.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
